definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be in trepidation, hurry, or alarm (Ar. xafaza hasten, incite, urge);—
be in a hurry or alarm, of hurried flight 2Sa 4:4, 2Ki 7:15; Inf. c. [[ב]] = noun, in my alarm Ps 31:23, Ps 116:11; be alarmed De 20:3 (‖[[תיראו]]), Job 40:23 (of hippopot.)

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נֶתְפָָּזוּ]] Ps 48:6 (‖[[נִבְהֲלוּ]]) hurry away in alarm; so Impf. [[יֵחָפֵזָוּן]] Ps 104:7 (‖[[יְּנוּסוּן]]); Inf. [[הֵחָֽפְזֵם]] 2Ki 7:15 Kt v. supr.; Pt. [[נֶחְפָּז]] 1Sa 23:26 hurried [[ללבת]] ´[[ויהי דוד נ]] and David became hurried to go.
